mapper.sql: re_uid, phone, create_time, chan_name, versionname, buildrelease, manufacturer, androidmodel
mapper.select:
select u.phone, u.create_time as createTime, u.chan_name as chanName, u.versionname as versionName, u.buildrelease as buildRelease, u.manufacturer, u.androidmodel as androidModel from m_register_user u
AND u.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
order by u.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into m_register_user (re_uid, phone, create_time, chan_name, versionname, buildrelease, manufacturer, androidmodel) values (#{reUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into m_register_user
re_uid,
phone,
create_time,
chan_name,
versionname,
buildrelease,
manufacturer,
androidmodel,

#{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update m_register_user
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR},
versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR},
buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR},
androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR},
where re_uid = #{reUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update m_register_user set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR}, buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR} where re_uid = #{reUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into m_register_user ( phone, create_time,chan_name, versionname, buildrelease, manufacturer, androidmodel) values
(#{po.phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{po.chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.versionName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.buildRelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.androidModel,jdbcType=CHAR})
